snippet: Our dining room is painted dark gray, but I’ve read that light neutral colors are better when you’re selling your home. Should we repaint it?
abstract: Market Ready Q&A answers question about whether it is better to paint walls neutral colors before selling home.
lead_paragraph: Our dining room is painted dark gray, but I’ve read that light neutral colors are better when you’re selling your home. Should we repaint it?

headline.seo: Using Light Colors to Sell a Home
